mapper.insert: insert into tb_travel_spot ( SPOT_NO, SPOT_CONTENT_ID, SPOT_CONTENT_TYPE, SPOT_TEL, SPOT_TITLE, SPOT_IMG_PATH, SPOT_ADDRESS, SPOT_POSTAL_CODE, SPOT_MAPX, SPOT_MAPY, LARGE_CATEGORY_NO, MIDDLE_CATEGORY_NO, SMALL_CATEGORY_NO, AREA_CATEGORY_NO, CITY_CATEGORY_NO ) values ( seq_spotno.nextval, #{spotContentId}, #{spotContentType}, #{spotTel}, #{spotTitle}, #{spotImgPath}, #{spotAddress}, #{spotPostalCode}, #{spotMapx}, #{spotMapy}, #{largeCategoryNo}, #{middleCategoryNo}, #{smallCategoryNo}, #{areaCategoryNo}, #{cityCategoryNo} )

choose.when:
select spot_no, spot_title, spot_address, large_category_no, middle_category_no, small_category_no, spot_img_path
from tb_travel_spot where area_category_no = #{areaCode}
choose.otherwise:
select spot_no, spot_title, spot_address, large_category_no, middle_category_no, small_category_no, spot_img_path
from tb_travel_spot where area_category_no = #{areaCode} and spot_title like #{searchValue}
